Episodes.Title: The Wrath of Graham
Episodes.Plot:
A high school student develops an ability after injecting promicin. Tom visits Isabelle in jail, while Diana searches for her missing sister. 

Following the advice of a young woman, named Cassie, Kyle is able to wake Shawn from his coma. Jordan Collier's conscience gets to him. Meanwhile, NTAC gets a new director.

Episodes.Title: Fear Itself
Episodes.Plot:
Tom and Diana search for someone who has the ability to make people's worst fears come true. 

Danny seeks Shawn's help to find a promicin shot. Meanwhile, Cassie leads Kyle to a book that contains a prophecy about Jordan Collier.

Episodes.Title: Audrey Parker's Come and Gone
Episodes.Plot:
An elderly woman develops the ability to astral project unseen by others, but she is stuck in limbo when her body is murdered, and she must find a way to contact Tom and Diana to help catch her killer. 

Elsewhere, Shawn decides to start healing people again despite threats.

Episodes.Title: The Truth & Nothing But The Truth
Episodes.Plot: April's new ability takes her in a danger. Meanwhile, Shawn is approached to run for public office. Kyle helps Isabelle.

Episodes.Title: Try The Pie
Episodes.Plot: Tom tracks Jordan to a small town, where he meets a woman who can relieve people's stress by talking to them. Meanwhile, Marco and Diana have a nice talk. Maia's visions are giving her nightmares.

Episodes.Title: The Marked
Episodes.Plot: Jordan wants Shawn to rejoin the movement. Meanwhile, a 4400 with an amazing ability disappears.

Episodes.Title: Till We Have Built Jerusalem
Episodes.Plot: When Jordan Collier and his followers seize control of most of Seattle, the government sends a Delta Force of enhanced soldiers to capture Collier dead or alive.

Episodes.Title: No Exit
Episodes.Plot: P.J. took the Promicin shot 2 months ago. Now he has an ability...

Episodes.Title: Daddy's Little Girl
Episodes.Plot:
Richard returns from hiding to abduct Isabelle from Promise City, hoping to "start over."  

Meanwhile, Tess, her schizophrenia out of control, uses her ability to take control of a diner full of people.
Episodes.Writer: Ira Steven Behr, Amy E. Berg

Episodes.Title: One of Us
Episodes.Plot:
Tom and Diana look for Richard, but Tom is distracted by his dreams about the future. 

Meanwhile, Collier is threatened by Shawn's test that could determine who would die from a Promicin shot.

Episodes.Title: Ghost in the Machine
Episodes.Plot: Tom and Diana must race to find the source of a computer virus that could bring down Ubient software, one of the world's largest software companies that is run by suspected member of the marked, Drew Imroth. Meanwhile, Maia visits Promise City where she receives an unexpected birthday surprise: a visit from her birth parents.

Episodes.Title: Tiny Machines
Episodes.Plot:
Meghan and Diana learn how to remove the entity from Tom, but the procedure is dangerous. 

Meanwhile, Shawn finds help in his attempt to rescue Kevin from Promise City; and Jordan is betrayed by someone close.

Episodes.Title: The Great Leap Forward
Episodes.Plot: Paramedics try to resuscitate Susan Farrell. They believe that she took promicin and lost the 50/50 lotto that comes with it. Danny is certain that she did not take the shot. After arriving at the hospital with the paramedics, things get complicated as everyone around Danny start to die. Garrity and another NTAC agent are sent to the hospital to assess the situation.
